message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $130. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something closer to my original asking price. How about $120?
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $110 for the product. This is my final offer within my budget.
